name: Silk Ribbon Ballet Flats

description: Versatile autumn boots with a 2-inch block heel. Features a side zipper for easy wear. Durable synthetic leather.

description: Ultra-lightweight slip-on sneakers designed for low-impact activities. Features a high-rebound cushioning system.

description: Fashionable summer wedges with a woven straw sole and adjustable ankle strap. Great for brunch or beach outings.

description: Modern sneakers with a 1.5-inch platform sole. Combines comfort with a stylish height boost.

description: Luxury boots crafted from Italian suede. Features a slim fit and a partial side zip for a tailored look.
